properties.areaDesc: Northern and Eastern Klamath County and Western Lake County; Central and Eastern Lake County
properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 31 at 2:01PM PST until January 1 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Portions of Highway 31 from Paisley to Summer Lake,
Highway 140 east of Lakeview including Warner Mountain Summit,
and most other high terrain areas in Lake County.

* WHEN...From 1 AM to 4 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may
result. High profile vehicles may have difficulties.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high
profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY
